azurerm_app_service_custom_hostname_bind.description: Manages a Hostname Binding within an App Service.

hostname.description: Specifies the Custom Hostname to use for the App Service, example `www.example.com`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

app_service_name.description: The name of the App Service in which to add the Custom Hostname Binding. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group in which the App Service exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ssl_state.description: The SSL type. Possible values are `IpBasedEnabled` and `SniEnabled`. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

thumbprint.description: The SSL certificate thumbprint. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
thumbprint.notes: `thumbprint` must be specified when `ssl_state` is set.

id.description: The ID of the App Service Custom Hostname Binding

virtual_ip.description: The virtual IP address assigned to the hostname if IP based SSL is enabled.

create.description: Used when creating the App Service Custom Hostname Binding.

update.description: Used when updating the App Service Custom Hostname Binding.

read.description: Used when retrieving the App Service Custom Hostname Binding.

delete.description: Used when deleting the App Service Custom Hostname Binding.
